https://tmrev.io/movie/296098-Bridge of Spies 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bORlvwnVJE1Z6yIg96qnLLY3LJQ.jpg During the Cold War, the Soviet Union captures U.S. pilot Francis Gary Powers after shooting down his U-2 spy plane. Sentenced to 10 years in prison, Powers' only hope is New York lawyer James Donovan, recruited by a CIA operative to negotiate his release. Donovan boards a plane to Berlin, hoping to win the young man's freedom through a prisoner exchange. If all goes well, the Russians would get Rudolf Abel, the convicted spy who Donovan defended in court. Bridge of Spies
